backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling jobs, contact requests, user profiles, and admin/user authorization with add/update job operations and profile management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend files including components, hooks, and config utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining OKLCH color variables, theming for light/dark modes, and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document with metadata, favicon, SEO description, and script loading the React entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for all pages and wraps them in the SiteLayout, including protected admin route.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Component that checks authentication and admin status, showing login or access-denied states before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/admin/ContactReq: Admin table listing contact form submissions with loading, error, and empty states using React Query data.
frontend/src/components/admin/JobEditorD: Dialog form for creating or editing jobs, handling form state, category mapping, and submit mutations.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthButtons: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with automatic session handling and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/common/EmptyStat: Reusable empty state component displaying an icon, title, description, and optional action.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Contact form that submits user details via a mutation and shows success or error alerts.
frontend/src/components/contact/Floating: Floating WhatsApp button that opens a prefilled chat using configured phone number and message.
frontend/src/components/contact/WhatsApp: Button that opens WhatsApp with a custom or default prefilled message.
frontend/src/components/jobs/FeaturedJob: Section that lists active jobs with pagination, loading skeletons, and empty/error states.
frontend/src/components/jobs/JobCard.tsx: Card displaying job details and an Apply Now button that triggers the apply form.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with company info, navigation links, social links, and branding credits.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive site header with navigation, admin access, auth buttons, and mobile drawer menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapping content with header, footer, and a floating WhatsApp FAB.
frontend/src/config/krStaffing.ts: Configuration for Google Form prefills, WhatsApp contact info, and social links.
frontend/src/content/copy.ts: Provides static text content for the site including hero text, categories, testimonials, about, contact, privacy, and terms sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminJobs.ts: Defines admin-focused hooks for adding, updating, activating, deactivating jobs, seeding example jobs, and fetching contact requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and exposing identity state through a provider and hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides user-facing data hooks for fetching active jobs, profiles, admin status, submitting contact forms, and saving user profiles.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS base styles and custom CSS variables for theming, including light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/applyNow.ts: Builds and opens a prefilled Google Form URL for job applications based on job title and city.
frontend/src/lib/categories.ts: Defines job category metadata and utilities for looking up categories and labels used throughout the UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page using copy content split into paragraphs inside a styled card.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard for managing jobs, seeding examples, editing entries, and reviewing contact requests.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Displays job categories as cards and navigates to filtered job listings when a category is selected.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact page with WhatsApp quick support and a contact form inside UI cards.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with a hero search form, popular searches, categories, featured jobs, and contact options.
frontend/src/pages/JobsPage.tsx: Provides job search and filtering with keyword, city, and category, showing paginated job results.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Shows the privacy policy content by rendering formatted paragraphs and section headers.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Displays the terms of service, splitting and formatting content into paragraphs and headings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, goals, design guidelines, image requirements, and a list of existing planned features for building the KR Staffing mobile‑first job portal.
